ngoList.title: YOUNG ENVOYS INTERNATIONAL
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: To promote values among children through art and culture. OrganiseRegular workshops for village chilren on all sundays and holidays.Short term wrokshops for 5-6 dayds for preparing graphics/paintings for participation at national and international exhibitions-about 30 in a year.Organising an exhibition of art for children and youth at national/international level and encouraging them with awards.Publication of Art Drive a quarterly magazine for children on art events.Organising Bapu Darshan the mobile exhibition of paintings of the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi in different schools and organising workshops at every school. Students who attend the classes and wrkshops of our Rural art centre have won International an national awards. They own awards from Poland, Japan,Purtugal,China, Egypy,Macedonia,slovakia,Belarus,Turkey and own top awards like Golden brush, golden horse, golden pallettte and hunderds of diplomas.
